resources.string: You have just joined a unique challenge that only has to help the whole world, recycle your garbage and still win with it.

We at GREEN CODE aim to help the inhabitants of the land to recycle the waste they generate, such as plastic, metal, paper and others. For that we are happy with the fact that you allow us to help you dispose of your garbage in a way that is more pleasant to the environment and society worldwide.
WHAT DO YOU GET FROM \n RECYCLING?
Initially the GREEN CODE MACHINE collect plastic materials as well as glass composite materials.

"We at GREEN CODE thought about what we could give to our recyclers, and thinking about that we decided to give GREEN points to each recycled material and with these points our recyclers could exchange for discounts on products, services or even donate to an NGO. "
